name: Bronze Hammer
description:
BRONZE HAMMER The story so far...

The great, gracious and all powerful overlord Life-Subtractor has been defeated by a trio of do good heroes. While the rest of the overlord’s forces weren’t enough to stand up against the threat of the adventurers, his fearless and loyal generals, who were sent away to conquer lands in their master’s name, have returned to enforce and disperse justice and revenge against the perpetrators who would dare shatter the dreams of their adored leader. To exact their revenge, the generals shall have to battle their way through the followers of the heroes and defeat each one inside their own stronghold.

What is Bronze Hammer?

Bronze Hammer is a Spiritual Successor to the Sega-Genesis game 'Golden Axe' from 1989. Our game is a 2D Beat 'em Up Side Scroller where the player can choose from 3 different characters in order to set out on a journey to defeat the goody-two-shoe hero's kingdom.
